name: Sony Xperia Z5 Compact
description: Sony Xperia Z5 Compact Android smartphone. Announced 2015, September. Features 3G, 4.6â€³ IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen, 23 MP camera, Wi-Fi, GPS, Bluetooth.

Network.Speed: HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE Cat4 150/50 Mbps (E5803), LTE Cat6 300/50 Mbps (E5823)

Body.Others: - IP68 certified - dust proof and water resistant over 1.5 meter and 30 minutes

Platform.OS: Android OS, v5.1.1 (Lollipop), upgradable to v6.0 (Marshmallow)
Platform.CPU: Quad-core 1.5 GHz Cortex-A53 & Quad-core 2.0 GHz Cortex-A57

Camera.Primary: 23 MP, f/2.0, 24mm, phase detection autofocus, LED flash, check quality
Camera.Features: 1/2.3" sensor size, geo-tagging, touch focus, face detection, HDR, panorama

Comms.WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, DLNA, hotspot
Comms.GPS: Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS/ BDS (market dependant)

Features.Sensors: Fingerprint (EU model only), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer
Features.Messaging: SMS (threaded view), MMS, Email, IM, Push Email
Others: Fast battery charging: 60% in 30 min (Quick Charge 2.0)
Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic

Battery.Stand-by: Up to 520 h (2G) / Up to 520 h (3G)
Battery.Talk time: Up to 11 h 30 min (2G) / Up to 14 h 50 min (3G)

Tests.Performance: Basemark OS II: 1696 / Basemark OS II 2.0: 1440Basemark X: 23703
